code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var tableDimensionsSlice=createSlice({name:'tableDimensions',initialState:{height:null,width:null,totalRows:null,totalCols:null},reducers:{setTableDimensions:function setTableDimensions(state,action){state.height=action.payload.height!=null?action.payload.height:state.height;state.width=action.payload.width!=null?action.payload.width:state.width;},setRowsAndCols:function setRowsAndCols(state,action){state.totalRows=action.payload.rows;state.totalCols=action.payload.cols;}}});var _tableDimensionsSlice=tableDimensionsSlice.actions,setTableDimensions=_tableDimensionsSlice.setTableDimensions,setRowsAndCols=_tableDimensionsSlice.setRowsAndCols;export{setTableDimensions,setRowsAndCols};export var getTableHeight=function getTableHeight(state){return state.tableDimensions.height;};export var getTableWidth=function getTableWidth(state){return state.tableDimensions.width;};export var getTableDimensions=function getTableDimensions(state){return[state.tableDimensions.height,state.tableDimensions.width];};export var getRowsAndCols=function getRowsAndCols(state){return[state.tableDimensions.totalRows,state.tableDimensions.totalCols];};export default tableDimensionsSlice.reducer;
